title: Tarot Fantastic
description: For centuries, the Tarot has been used as a tool of divination to unravel the mysteries of the future. Now some of today's most imaginative writers cast fortunes for the unsuspecting in these unforgettable tales, ranging from the whimsical to the chilling, from the provocative to the ominous. So pick up this mystical tome, and discover what lies in store for those within.
author: Martin H. Greenberg
